title: Help me out with ZED
body:
Pls! Anything, any tip at all, just trow it below!

I play only couple games a week, don't play ranked and its usually a team builder (so no bans). I go support or jungle.

When i jungle i can have a bit more influence...

But when im playing support... I mean what do I do? I see less and less Zeds roam bot, but after lvl 12 there is very little i can do to slow him down as a support.He is like *chak-chak* - 1.5 sec and my adc is dead, I was of no use....

My only hope is to pick {{champion:117}} forever and to save all the "**Cuddly incoming**"s for him and hope that my team does not miss the opportunity.



So anything you have, please share.

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/scale_super/14/144096/3368430-4864233108-IDW20.png

Thank you.

replies.body:
{{summoner:3}} - best thing against him

{{item:3092}} {{champion:267}} {{item:3222}} - pretty effective
I was also able to keep {{champion:238}} from my ADC with {{champion:412}} 

also {{champion:40}} {{champion:16}} (remember her silence pool?) {{champion:1}} {{champion:37}} (and I also had some sucess with {{champion:161}} )

you can play effectively against Zed almost with anything.


Cannot say for jungle. That is another country for me.
I had little success with the last 5 :)
Firtstly you just have to accept The fact that if someone from your team mispositions he si probably gonna die.
Honestly as a support, Crucible is the most effective way to keep your ADC alive, Zed marks your carry, you remove the mark

Tnx.

The problem I have is that i forget that items have active abilities. But ill have to work on that.
Buy quicksilver sash  (or tell your teammate to) {{item:3140}}   because it removes deathmark
Yeah! That's a good tip thank you.

walk directly on top of your adc and he might ult you instead of your adc
either that or crucible 
or when you see zed coming use your w on your adc not zed
zed cant kill your adc if he can't get close enough
